Text.Page:
Greetings! Are you getting excited for festival season?

I'm so excited, I would fly my carpet over there right now if they'd let me!

Alas...I'm on duty to help people get there. So, you know...if you don't go now, I'm missing out on all the fun for nothing...

(Note: Level requirements may apply for certain quests.)

I'm afraid you caught me between festivals.

But when the next festival starts, you should come visit me. I'll get you right to the center of all the fun!
